channel.title: Yell 99 skill to all
channel.description: Umm... I know this is a bit simple, but how do I make it so that when somebody reaches 99 of a skill, it yells that they achieved 99 skill? Thanks! :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 06:43:04 AM[/size][hr]OMG People... does anybody know how to do this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2008, 05:18:20 AM[/size][hr]WHAT THE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
